properties.name: Mode
properties.summary: Gets or sets the shape map mode.

properties.name: PrimaryShape
properties.summary: Primary shape (used for the center in radial mode).

properties.name: SecondaryShape
properties.summary: Secondary shape (used for the edge in radial mode).

properties.name: SecondaryChance
properties.summary: Probability (0..1) of choosing the secondary shape in random mode.

properties.name: CornerSize
properties.summary: Corner zone size in modules for .

properties.name: ApplyToEyes
properties.summary: When true, allows the shape map to affect eye modules.

properties.name: ProtectFunctionalPatterns
properties.summary: When true, functional patterns keep the base module shape.
